Track all notable changes, new features,: Track all notable changes, new features, and bug fixes in MBC CQRS Serverless releases.
Add code analysis tools for AI-assisted: Add code analysis tools for AI-assisted development
`mbc_check_anti_patterns`: Detect common: `mbc_check_anti_patterns`: Detect common anti-patterns in code with severity levels
`mbc_explain_code`: Analyze and explain: `mbc_explain_code`: Analyze and explain code in MBC CQRS context
Limit regex match range to prevent false: Limit regex match range to prevent false positives
Add error handling for file reading and: Add error handling for file reading and JSON parsing
Add 18 unit tests for analyze tools: Add 18 unit tests for analyze tools
Fix security vulnerabilities in dependen: Fix security vulnerabilities in dependencies: qs, express, body-parser
All notable changes to MBC CQRS Serverle: All notable changes to MBC CQRS Serverless are documented here. This project follows [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/) and [Conventional Commits](https://conventionalcommits.org/).
Fix Step Functions CSV handler always se: Fix Step Functions CSV handler always setting COMPLETED status regardless of child job failures
Fixed `CsvImportSfnEventHandler.finalize: Fixed `CsvImportSfnEventHandler.finalizeParentJob()` to correctly set status to FAILED when any child job fails
Fixed `CsvImportSfnEventHandler` in `csv: Fixed `CsvImportSfnEventHandler` in `csv_loader` state to correctly set status when early finalization occurs with failures
Previously, the ternary operator was inc: Previously, the ternary operator was incorrectly returning COMPLETED for both cases: `failedRows > 0 ? COMPLETED : COMPLETED`
Now correctly returns FAILED when failed: Now correctly returns FAILED when failedRows > 0: `failedRows > 0 ? FAILED : COMPLETED`
This bug caused Step Functions to report: This bug caused Step Functions to report SUCCESS even when child import jobs failed
Fix master job status not updating to FA: Fix master job status not updating to FAILED when child import jobs fail
Previously, when a child import job fail: Previously, when a child import job failed with errors like `ConditionalCheckFailedException`, the master job status remained `PROCESSING` indefinitely
Fixed `incrementParentJobCounters` to co: Fixed `incrementParentJobCounters` to correctly set master job status to `FAILED` when any child job fails (was always setting to `COMPLETED`)
Fixed `ImportQueueEventHandler.handleImp: Fixed `ImportQueueEventHandler.handleImport` to call `incrementParentJobCounters` on error, ensuring parent counters are updated
Removed `throw error` in error handler t: Removed `throw error` in error handler to prevent Lambda crashes and allow proper status propagation
This fix completes the Step Functions er: This fix completes the Step Functions error handling started in v1.0.18, ensuring `SendTaskFailure` is properly triggered
Add `SendTaskFailure` support to `Import: Add `SendTaskFailure` support to `ImportStatusHandler` for proper Step Functions error handling
Previously, when an import job failed, t: Previously, when an import job failed, the Step Function would wait indefinitely because only `SendTaskSuccess` was implemented
Now the handler properly sends `SendTask: Now the handler properly sends `SendTaskFailure` when a job fails, allowing Step Functions to handle errors correctly
Handler now processes both `COMPLETED` a: Handler now processes both `COMPLETED` and `FAILED` statuses for CSV import jobs
Fix `masterTypeCode` comparison in `Mast: Fix `masterTypeCode` comparison in `MasterDataService.search()` - Changed from partial match (`contains`) to exact match for `settingCode` search parameter
Stabilize AbstractRunner tests by removi: Stabilize AbstractRunner tests by removing setTimeout to fix flaky CI failures
Fix security vulnerabilities in dependen: Fix security vulnerabilities in dependencies: jws (HMAC signature verification issue), nodemailer (DoS vulnerability)
Update README files for all packages wit: Update README files for all packages with comprehensive API references and usage examples
Fix `createTenantGroup` parameter name i: Fix `createTenantGroup` parameter name in tenant package README
Update Japanese guide links to official: Update Japanese guide links to official documentation
Add cleanup for test-generated files and: Add cleanup for test-generated files and update .gitignore
Improve error messages for better clarit: Improve error messages for better clarity
Include __s3Key in attributes for import: Include __s3Key in attributes for import creation
Add MCP server package for AI tool integ: Add MCP server package for AI tool integration
Add JSDoc comments to core interfaces: Add JSDoc comments to core interfaces
Handle unknown source IP in SequencesSer: Handle unknown source IP in SequencesService
Remove callback parameter from Lambda ha: Remove callback parameter from Lambda handler for Node.js 24 compatibility
Bump jws dependency for security fix: Bump jws dependency for security fix
Bump js-yaml dependency for security fix: Bump js-yaml dependency for security fix
Local infrastructure updates for import: Local infrastructure updates for import module
Added case-insensitive search for master: Added case-insensitive search for master data and settings
Fixed core package test failures blockin: Fixed core package test failures blocking CI
Handle Step Function name length limit: Handle Step Function name length limit
Core package service unit test enhanceme: Core package service unit test enhancement
Implemented comprehensive unit tests for: Implemented comprehensive unit tests for controllers
Master package service unit test enhance: Master package service unit test enhancement
Implemented unit tests for high-priority: Implemented unit tests for high-priority packages

Fixed get format sequence from master da: Fixed get format sequence from master data item
Updated template to use Node 20 runtime: Updated template to use Node 20 runtime
Added queue and Step Function for task p: Added queue and Step Function for task processing
